segments.text: Over by the cabinets, there's a different kind of drama happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see two children, a boy and a girl, involved in a secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His arm is stretched so far into that jar, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like they are definitely not supposed to be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the "COOKIE JAR" label quite clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, what a clever little scheme they've got going on!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be quite a team, working together for those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thrill of a forbidden cookie is unlike any other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focus is entirely on those delicious biscuits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, right there.
segments.speaker: PAR
